resources.string: From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the system requires access to device\'s location in order to scan for Bluetooth Smart devices. \n\nBluetooth beacons, like iBeacons or Eddystone beacons, may be used to determine the phone\'s and user\'s location, However nRF Blinky will not be using device location information for any purpose.
Please turn on location services from the locations settings manually.
This device does not support Bluetooth Smart!
